entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow or rain this evening. Fog patches after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
